items.name: Component_Visual
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_Visual
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_Visual extends gs.Component
    ###*
    * The base class for all components displaying an object on screen.
    * @module gs
    * @class Component_Visual
    * @extends gs.Component
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: ->
        super
    
    ###*
    * Updates the origin-point of the game object.
    * @method updateOrigin
    ###
    updateOrigin: ->
        ox = 0
        oy = 0
        if @object.parent?
            p = @object.parent
            while p? and p.dstRect?
                ox += p.dstRect.x + p.offset.x
                oy += p.dstRect.y + p.offset.y
                p = p.parent
          
        ox += @object.offset.x
        oy += @object.offset.y

        
        @object.origin.x = ox
        @object.origin.y = oy
        
      
    ###*
    * Updates the origin and the destination-rectangle from a layout-rectangle if present.
    * @method update
    ###
    update: ->
        super
        @updateOrigin()
        
        
        if @object.layoutRect? and @object.parent?.dstRect?
            if @object.layoutRect.x then @object.dstRect.x = @object.layoutRect.x(@object.parent.dstRect.width)
            if @object.layoutRect.y then @object.dstRect.y = @object.layoutRect.y(@object.parent.dstRect.height)
            if @object.layoutRect.width then @object.dstRect.width = @object.layoutRect.width(@object.parent.dstRect.width)
            if @object.layoutRect.height then @object.dstRect.height = @object.layoutRect.height(@object.parent.dstRect.height)



gs.Component_Visual = Component_Visual
